extendedInfo.description: Learn Brazilian Jiu Jitsu via video techniques by blackbelt and UFC veteran David Branch. Learn MMA and Wrestling from world class Edge affiliated athletes. Keep up to date with Edge news and social media. View the schedule and information for the Edge Hoboken Gym and sign up for a free week trial.About Edge HobokenEdge Hoboken Wrestling and Mixed Martial Arts is the first satellite school of the original Edge School of Wrestling that started 25 years ago by Ernie Monaco and his family. It was the first wrestling program of its kind in the United States. The Edge now cultivates Mixed Martial Artists as well as Wrestlers, and has trained some of New Jersey's best all-time wrestlers and MMA fighters. The goal is to continue this tradition every day the doors are open in the new location. The Edge offers Mixed Martial Arts training for both beginner MMA students and professional athletes alike. Continuing with tradition, youth wrestlers aged 6 to 14 years of age will be instructed by a highly experienced and accomplished coaching staff, while training with quality workout partners in a great practice environment. These characteristics embody everything that has made the Edge surpass the rest.

reviews.title: Edge Mma
reviews.comment: If you into MMA this app is the best thing since the gi was invented. Not only is this app veryinformative but the video explanations make it easy for all ages to understand... Well done Edge
reviews.author: Kevin Ottino
